Class ShapeBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.graphics.ShapeBatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class ShapeBatch
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer
    An extension of the ShapeRenderer with additional functionality.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)
